Accurate Maven Plugin Project
Project Documentation

  • Project Reports

accurest:generateTests

Full name:

io.codearte.accurest:accurest-maven-plugin:0.5.9-SNAPSHOT:generateTests

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-test-sources.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
baseClassForTests String - (no description)
basePackageForTests String - (no description)
Default value is: io.codearte.accurest.tests.
contractsDirectory File - (no description)
Default value is: ${project.basedir}/src/test/accurest.
User property is: accurest.contractsDirectory.
generatedTestSourcesDir File - (no description)
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/generated-test-sources/accurest.
nameSuffixForTests String - (no description)
ruleClassForTests String - (no description)
skip boolean - (no description)
Default value is: false.
User property is: accurest.skip.
testFramework TestFramework - (no description)
Default value is: JUNIT.
testMode TestMode - (no description)
Default value is: MOCKMVC.

Parameter Details

baseClassForTests:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

basePackageForTests:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: io.codearte.accurest.tests

contractsDirectory:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • User Property: accurest.contractsDirectory
  • Default: ${project.basedir}/src/test/accurest

generatedTestSourcesDir:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/generated-test-sources/accurest

nameSuffixForTests:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

ruleClassForTests:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

skip:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: accurest.skip
  • Default: false

testFramework:

(no description)
  • Type: io.codearte.accurest.config.TestFramework
  • Required: No
  • Default: JUNIT

testMode:

(no description)
  • Type: io.codearte.accurest.config.TestMode
  • Required: No
  • Default: MOCKMVC
